definition: Study everything, at all times, everywhere. (Zhu Xi 朱熹[Zhu1 Xi1])
pinyin: wu2 yi1 shi4 er2 bu4 xue2 , wu2 yi1 shi2 er2 bu4 xue2 , wu2 yi1 chu4 er2 bu4 de2
traditional: 無一事而不學，無一時而不學，無一處而不得
word: 无一事而不学，无一时而不学，无一处而不得
